page.title: 02DOCTOR REPORT (WALKDEN)
page.content: The{doctor}at Hodge Road, Walkden is Dr Sutherland, trained for 5 years in Aberdeen and a doctor for 9 years. He sees a total of 45 patients each day, some even at weekends. The most common{illness}is a{sore throat or {virus. }He says that the job is most frustrating when there is bad news for the patient but there are good times as well. The{most common groups}to visit the surgery are the{under 5's}and{over {65's.}He decided that he wanted to become a doctor because it is a challenge to work out what's wrong with a patient. He thinks that if people stop smoking and drinking and eat high fibre diets they could prevent illness. He does not agree that people should pay for prescriptions expecially the young or very old.
